posts.post_content: Why do I feel like all the evolve creatures are broken? It upsets me, because I wanna draft Simic but I'll never get a chance since everyone else will be doing it (that is what happened to me with Selesnya in RTR).
posts.html:

posts.post_content: Wow. That 4 toughness is guaranteed to evolve every creature you've cast before it, and that 0 power guarantees that creatures cast after it will evolve it. Excellent design!
posts.html:
Wow. That 4 toughness is guaranteed to evolve every creature you've cast before it, and that 0 power guarantees that creatures cast after it will evolve it. Excellent design!

Posted By: ThisisSakon (1/22/2013 3:33:28 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
THE SYNERGY. IT HURTS.  
  
It triggers evolve with its high toughness, then is affected by every evolve trigger. For 3 mana. Plus, it's unblockable. 4.5/5 for being ridiculous, but won't win on its own. I'd do 4.75/5 if I could
